title: Heredity
creator_credit: David Zweck, Glen Foster and Country Education Project
brief_description: Peter Couchman chairs a discussion between Professor David Danks from the Royal Children’s Hospital and Professor Roger Short from Monash University on issues surrounding genetics. Computerised simulation of matings between domestic animals are used to illustrate the discussion.
